original_title: Fuel QR quota to be topped every Tuesdays
original_body_lines: Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera said today that the weekly top-up day for the National Fuel Pass QR Quota will be changed to Tuesdays instead of Sundays.
The decision was taken to reduce the cost of distribution by operating Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) and Ceylon Petroleum Storage Terminals Limited (CPSTL) on weekends.
However, the fuel quotas will remain unchanged, he said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
